property.label: Elasticsearch REST URL
property.description: The URL where the Elasticsearch Cluster REST interface is available

property.label: User
property.description: User name to use to connect via Basic Authentication, leave empty for unauthenticated access

property.label: Password
property.description: Password if authentication is required, leave empty for unauthenticated access

property.label: Timeout
property.description: Timeout in milliseconds used when accessing the REST interface via HTTP

metric.name: NodeCount
metric.description: Number of active nodes

metric.name: DataNodeCount
metric.description: Number of active data nodes

metric.name: ActivePrimaryShards
metric.description: The number of primary shards that are used across the cluster

metric.name: ActiveShardsPercent
metric.description: Percentage of shards that are active, a green cluster should have 100% here

metric.name: ActiveShards
metric.description: The number of shards (primary and replica) that are used across the cluster

metric.name: RelocatingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently relocated

metric.name: InitializingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently initializing

metric.name: UnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently uninitialized

metric.name: DelayedUnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are in delayed state

metric.name: InitHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized on the heap per node

metric.name: MaxHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of heap-memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: InitNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized off-heap per node

metric.name: MaxNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of off-heap memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: MaxDirect
metric.description: The number of bytes of direct memory that can be used per node

metric.name: IndexCount
metric.description: The count of indexes

metric.name: ShardCount
metric.description: The number of shards with dynamic splittings by state

metric.name: DocCount
metric.description: Number of documents

metric.name: DeletedCount
metric.description: Number of deleted documents

metric.name: StoreSize
metric.description: Size of storage overall per node

metric.name: StoreThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that storing was throttled per node

metric.name: IndexingThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that indexing was throttled per node

metric.name: IndexingCurrent
metric.description: Currently active indexing operations per node

metric.name: DeleteCurrent
metric.description: Currently active delete operations per node

metric.name: QueryCurrent
metric.description: Currently active query operations per node

metric.name: FetchCurrent
metric.description: Currently active fetch operations per node

metric.name: ScrollCurrent
metric.description: Currently active scroll operations per node

metric.name: QueryCacheSize
metric.description: Size of the query cache per node

metric.name: FieldDataSize
metric.description: Size of the field data per node

metric.name: FieldDataEvictions
metric.description: How often field data was evicted from the field data cache

metric.name: PercolateSize
metric.description: Size used for percolation per node

metric.name: TranslogSize
metric.description: Size of the translog per node

metric.name: RequestCacheSize
metric.description: Size of the request cache

metric.name: RecoveryThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that recovery was throttled per node

metric.name: RecoveryAsSource
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered from this node

metric.name: RecoveryAsTarget
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered to this node

metric.name: CompletionSize
metric.description: Size of completion caches

metric.name: SegmentCount
metric.description: Number of segments

metric.name: SegmentSize
metric.description: Size of segments, split by different segment-measures

metric.name: FileDescriptorCount
metric.description: File descriptor metrics split by different file descriptor measures

metric.name: FileSystemSize
metric.description: File system metrics split by different file system measures

metric.name: PercolateCount
metric.description: Percolate metrics split by different percolate measures

description.value: Provides metrics from the configured Elasticsearch Cluster
